attributes.review: Donald Trump is a symbolic sociopath designed to make America Sick Again. And Again. And Again. And Again. He is an American public disgrace and a deadly menace to public policy. Remove him. Remove yourself from funding him. I urge you now or else you won’t have a company to even sell things to if we’re all dead.
attributes.title: POTUS 2020

attributes.review: This app gave trump my address and he raped me but I couldn't feel anything bc his dick is as big as is knowledge which if you don’t know is VERY VERY VERY little but anyways daddy anon saved me and you don’t vote for Kanye or Trump bc then I’ll die and then i won’t be able to have any more chicken nugs... anyways you useless virgins VOTE ME FOR PREZ LOSERS🤩😍💕👁👄👁🙈
attributes.title: Me for president

attributes.review: As a Trump supporter I downloaded this app and it’s just sooo slow and has so many issues I can’t even name all of them . Like at this point just take it down it’s a disgrace of an app. Absolutely terrible. It only took one day for me to realize it was just a sorry excuse for an app by OUR OWN PRESIDENT. just NO!
attributes.title: HORRIFIC

attributes.review: This app took a whole day to download and was very glitchy when I was on it this app needs improvement. This app gives false information. This app took lots of storage up in my phone for a bad quality app. I don’t think this app should be on the App Store.
attributes.title: Bad app!!

attributes.review:
i was so excited to support our great and amazing president by downloading this absolutely fabulous app. unfortunately this is the worst app i have ever seen. you can do anything you put your mind to 💖✨🧚🏻 but not this 💓🍃🌟
jokes aside this really made my day 😗🥵WORSE
attributes.title: better luck next time

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this (which took about an hour and why is this app not free?!) it immediately gave me a ginormous migraine which built up until I fainted while at work. I would not recommend this experience to a friend 0/10.
attributes.title: Not worth the money

attributes.review: First off when you opens the app it says soo many racists things that do t even want to type! It talks about how he hates Mexico 🇲🇽!! 😡 I just “ wanted “ to support my “ favorite” president, but it did not let me do that do not get the app there is nothing that will make you happy 🤬😡
attributes.title: I hate this 🤢🤮

attributes.review: First off the fact that it took over a day for this stupid app to download is idiotic. I wanted to try to have a little fun and learn about trump little did I know that mini orange figures dressed in suits would arrive at my front door that’s all you need to know just delete the app!
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: App to a WHOLE day to load and it wouldn’t let me access said app without giving my phone number. And I know those gen z kids are doing a lot right now to stop trump from “making America great again” but I just wanted to stay in tune with my people.
attributes.title: I just wanna love trump BUT

attributes.review: This app kept glitching and I realized there was stickers that was very offensive I wouldn’t recommend anyone to download it plz!! This was a total waste of time I hate the fact the App Store even bothered to put this app on here... I thought this app was better than this!!
attributes.title: This app causes death rip (Gen z 2020💕💅🏾)
